PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04482022-04-29TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Security Regulations, 2012 (Various Amendments)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS, 2012 (VARIOUS AMENDMENTS) in order to (1) transfer the responsibility for cutting locks and seals on checked baggage from air carriers to the Canadian Air Transport Security Authority (CATSA); (2) simplify requirements around Restricted Area Identity Cards issued to airport workers; (3) update and clarify definitions and requirements, and formalize existing procedures; (4) update the nomenclature used to describe designated Canadian airports; (5) clarify requirements around identity documents for screening purposes and remove references to gender as a criteria for identity screening; (6) assert the authority of the Minister of Transport to direct CATSA to conduct identity screening; (7) formalize procedures for CATSA to notify the Minister of Transport regarding changes to screening equipment and software; (8) require CATSA to establish and implement a written security program including standards for screening, officer training and certification; (9) designate new requirements as enforceable through monetary penalties; and (10) make minor administrative clarifications and updates.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0092 Publication Date: 2022-05-11
AttachmentsAttachment
